name: TC_REQ_COMMENTS_SUMMARY
description: Contains information about Transfer Center notes.

columns.name: COMM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the communication record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TC_REQUEST_COMMENT_TEXT
columns.description: Free text information that can be documented for a transfer center request

columns.name: TC_REQ_COMMENT_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: When a user documents information in the free text note, this item will store the timestamp of when it was edited.

columns.name: TC_REQUEST_COMMENT_USER_ID
columns.description: When a user edits a Transfer Center request's free text information, this will store what user made the edit.

columns.name: TC_REQUEST_COMMENT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
